title: Confirm existence of ACCOUNT icon
custom_expected: THEN an "Account" icon is present in the upper right of the page

title: Confirm click to login page
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Account" icon on the page
custom_expected: THEN the login page is displayed at https://www.mlb.com/login?redirectUri=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.mlb.com%2F

title: Confirm megamenu at 1200px+
custom_expected: THEN hovering over "NEWS" in the navigation will open the megamenu and display "IN THIS SECTION."

title: Confirm sections+arrow at 568 - 1199px
custom_expected: THEN "SECTIONS" will display on the left with a dropdown arrow next to it and expanding will display "NEWS"

title: Confirm arrow at 320-567px
custom_expected: THEN a dropdown arrow will display on the left and expanding will display "NEWS"

title: Confirm presence of mini scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the mini scoreboard will be displayed on the left

title: Confirm yesterday clickthrough
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the arrow to the left of the day (Tuesday)
custom_expected: THEN the SCORES page loads showing the previous day's games

title: Confirm today clickthrough
custom_expected: THEN the SCORES page loads showing today's games

title: Confirm tomorrow clickthrough
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the arrow to the right of the day (Tuesday)
custom_expected: THEN the SCORES page loads showing tomorrow's games

title: Confirm correct day of week based on flip time
custom_expected: THEN the mini scoreboard will display the current day (if after 10AM ET) or the previous day (if before 10AM ET)

title: Confirm presence of single matchup
custom_expected: THEN the mini scoreboard displays at least one matchup during spring training/regular season/postseason

title: Crawl through panels for 404/broken images
custom_expected: THEN the media will will not display any broken panels or links

title: Confirm presence of media (video, cut 4, news)
custom_expected:
THEN the mixed feed will display at least one of the following:
Video, Cut4, News

title: Confirm presence of component
custom_expected: THEN "Latest News" will be displayed on the page

title: Confirm presence of article
custom_expected: THEN at least one article will be displayed under "Latest News."

title: Confirm presence of component
custom_expected: THEN "Follow MLB" is displayed on the page

title: Confirm Facebook
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Facebook" icon under "Follow MLB"
custom_expected: THEN https://www.facebook.com/mlb loads

title: Confirm Twitter
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Twitter" icon under "Follow MLB"
custom_expected: THEN https://twitter.com/mlb loads

title: Confirm Instagram
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Instagram" icon under "Follow MLB"
custom_expected: THEN https://www.instagram.com/mlb loads

title: Confirm Snapchat
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Snapchat" icon under "Follow MLB"
custom_expected: THEN https://www.snapchat.com/add/mlb loads

title: Confirm YouTube
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Youtube" icon under "Follow MLB"
custom_expected: THEN https://www.youtube.com/user/mlb loads

title: Confirm TikTok
custom_expected: THEN https://www.tiktok.com/@mlb is loaded

title: Confirm presence
custom_expected: THEN "Standings" is displayed on the page

title: Confirm league toggle
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking "American League" 
OR
clicking "National League"
custom_expected:
THEN the correct teams are displayed.

AL EAST: BAL/NYY/BOS/TB/TOR
AL CENTRAL: CLE/MIN/DET/CWS/KC
AL WEST: HOU/LAA/SEA/OAK/TEX

NL EAST: WSH/NYM/PHI/MIA/ATL
NL CENTRAL: STL/CIN/CHC/MIL/PIT
NL WEST: COL/LAD/ARI/SD/SF

title: Confirm division toggle
custom_expected:
THEN the correct teams are displayed.

AL EAST: BAL/NYY/BOS/TB/TOR
AL CENTRAL: CLE/MIN/DET/CWS/KC
AL WEST: HOU/LAA/SEA/OAK/TEX

NL EAST: WSH/NYM/PHI/MIA/ATL
NL CENTRAL: STL/CIN/CHC/MIL/PIT
NL WEST: COL/LAD/ARI/SD/SF

title: Confirm "Full Standings" links to desktop link on desktop
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Full Standings" from a desktop browser
custom_expected: THEN http://mlb.mlb.com/mlb/standings/index.jsp is loaded

title: Confirm "Full Standings" links to mobile link on phone
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Full Standings" from a mobile device
custom_expected: THEN http://m.mlb.com/standings is loaded

title: Confirm presence
custom_expected: THEN "League Leaders" is displayed on the page

title: Confirm headshot presence
custom_expected: THEN "League Leader" players are displaying headshots

title: Confirm batting/pitching toggle
custom_expected:
THEN the data changes as expected between batting stats (ex: AVG/HR/RBI/SB) or pitching stats (W/SV/SO)

Note: Displayed stat values may change

title: Confirm Batting tab only displays position players (1B, 2B, 3B, SS, C, LF, RF, CF, DH, P)
custom_expected: THEN only positions (1B, 2B, 3B, SS, C, LF, RF, CF, DH, P) are displayed

title: Confirm Pitching tab only displays pitchers (P)
custom_expected: THEN only position (P) is displayed

title: Confirm "Sortable Stats" links to desktop link on desktop
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Sortable Stats" from a desktop browser
custom_expected: THEN http://mlb.mlb.com/stats/sortable.jsp is loaded

title: Confirm "Sortable Stats" links to mobile link on mobile
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Sortable Stats" from a mobile device
custom_expected: THEN http://m.mlb.com/stats is loaded

custom_expected: THEN "Official Information" is displayed in a dropdown

custom_expected: THEN "Help/Contact Us" is displayed in a dropdown

custom_expected: THEN "More MLB Sites & Affiliates" is displayed in a dropdown

title: Confirm "Careers" dropdown
custom_expected: THEN "Careers" is displayed in a dropdown
